title: Kevin Spacey Admits He's Homeless After Sexual Assault Scandals
shortdescription: Disgraced actor reveals he's crashing in hotels and Airbnbs with no permanent home.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: /images/Kevin Spacey Admits He's Homeless After Sexual Assault Scandals.webp

In a tearful new interview, Kevin Spacey has admitted he is effectively homeless — living out of suitcases in hotels and short-term Airbnbs after losing everything in legal battles and canceled projects.
Spacey claims he’s sold all properties, including his $20M Baltimore home, to pay mounting legal fees. 'I have nowhere to live,' he said. 'I’m staying wherever I can.'
